properties.address: Madron Methodist Church, Penzance, Cornwall TR20 8SL
properties.description: The chapel schoolroom is a space of about 2,000 sq ft with an adjoining kitchen. We have modern chairs and tables to accommodate up to 50 people. We also have toys and games for the younger people. Older folk can have fun with board/card games and/or jigsaws. The room is heated by electric wall mounted heaters.
properties.title: Madron Methodist Church schoolroom

properties.address: St Buryan Church, Penzance, Cornwall TR19 6BA
properties.description: A Food Larder is available for all those in need. Warm winter clothes also available during the cold months. Breakfast Club - 1st Thursday of each month. Soup Lunch - 3rd Thursday of each month. No charge for the above. Donations can be made for the ongoing mission & ministry of the church. Dog friendly.
properties.title: St Buryan Church

properties.address: The Open Door, 14 Wendron Street, Helston, Cornwall TR13 8PS
properties.description: A safe space to keep out of the cold, have a chat and a hot drink. We can also help with sign posting to agencies that may be able to help with any issues you may be going through. The Open Door is also where our Helston & The Lizard foodbank can be accessed on the same days but until 2pm.
properties.title: The Open Door

properties.address: The Flying Duck at Wayfarers Caravan Park, Penzance, Cornwall TR20 9EF
properties.description: We are keen to welcome EVERYONE to our Warm Space. A log fire, soup and a sandwich available is every Wednesday from 12.00am - 2.00pm for those who would like to spend time with others. Free, but donations always welcome.
properties.title: Wayfarers Caravan Park with St Hilary Church

properties.address: Wesley Rock Methodist Church, Penzance, Cornwall TR18 3JJ
properties.description: Church with kitchen & toilets all set out for coffee mornings & occasional afternoon teas. Heating in cold weather.
properties.title: Wesley Rock Methodist Church

properties.address: Treneere Community Hub, Cornwall TR18 3NZ
properties.description: Community hub offering a safe, warm space Tuesday-Friday 10.00am-15.00pm. Free refreshments and lunches. Workshops to include poetry & creative writing, menopause self care support group, woodwork group/repair cafe, cooking, craft sessions, gardening and mental health support groups. Crisis support packages, various organisations dropping in to give support and grants.
properties.title: Whole Again Communities CIC
